intro.heading: Rarely Languages
intro.text: This project provide a web interface to add url's to find text for rarely languages. The url's you provide will be crawled and reviewed for new text data. Afterwards you can request how many new data was found through your provided URL's. Thank you for your Support!

stepOne.heading: Step 1 » Please select a language where you want to add url's.

stepFour.heading: Complete » Thank you for your support!
stepFour.info: Your added URL's will be crawled soon! If you want too visit your results please click the following link!
stepFour.emailInfo: If you want to get an email about the crawling state of your submitted urls's please fill out the underlie form.
